name: Gullkin Hunter
movement: walk 20 ft., fly 30 ft., swim 30 ft.
description: The Gullkin Hunter is a versatile humanoid capable of flying and swimming, with a notable agility from its high Dexterity.
memorable: Its ability to manipulate aquatic environments and its two special abilities make it an interesting opponent.
goals: Typically hunts down enemies in combat while using its aquatic skills for survival.
relations: May be encountered alongside other aquatic creatures or in regions with water bodies.
environment: Found in aquatic or coastal environments, capable of navigating both land and water.
strengths: High agility and versatility in combat; effective in both melee and ranged attacks.
weaknesses: Average scores in Strength and Charisma may hinder physical confrontations and social interactions.
attacks: Can perform a Multiattack with Beak and Shortsword or two Shortbow attacks, dealing piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Tempest Breath pushes enemies away, disrupting their positioning and control.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 14, allowing it to notice hidden creatures or objects effectively.
skills: Has a base skill in perception with a +2 modifier.
additional_information: Can hold its breath for up to 5 minutes.
Effective in both melee and ranged combat.
Can mark a target to deal extra damage.
Typically works independently or in small packs.
Can manipulate enemy positioning with its breath attack.
test_queries: versatile humanoid with amazing swimming ability
hunter that can fly and swim adeptly
mobile creature skilled in ranged and melee combat
aquatic hunter with breath attack ability
agile foe that marks targets for extra damage
